name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications. Proficient in implementing **blockchain** technologies, including **smart contracts** development with **Solidity**, **EVM**, and **Foundry**. Strong programming skills in **Go**, **Rust**, **C++**, and **Scala** for efficient algorithm and data structure design, enhancing system performance. Hands-on expertise in **CI/CD**, optimizing **release pipelines**, and managing **environment orchestration** for seamless deployments.
Demonstrated capability in building AI/ML-powered platforms with core knowledge in deploying **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**. Skilled in development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
